import'./App.css';import Header from"./MyComponents/Header";import{Todos}from"./MyComponents/Todos";import{Footer}from"./MyComponents/Footer";import{AddTodo}from"./MyComponents/AddTodo";import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';// import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom';
import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){let initTodo;if(localStorage.getItem("todos")===null){initTodo=[];}else{initTodo=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("todos"));}const onDelete=todo=>{console.log("i am ondelete of todo",todo);setTodos(todos.filter(e=>{return e!==todo;}));localStorage.setItem("todos",JSON.stringify(todos));};const addTodo=(title,desc)=>{console.log("i am addding this todo",title,desc);let sno;if(todos.length===0){sno=0;}else{sno=todos[todos.length-1].sno+1;}const myTodo={sno:sno,title:title,desc:desc};setTodos([...todos,myTodo]);console.log(myTodo);};const[todos,setTodos]=useState(initTodo);useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem("todos",JSON.stringify(todos));},[todos]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"MyTodosList",searchBar:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTodo,{addTodo:addTodo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Todos,{todos:todos,onDelete:onDelete}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default App;
